channel.title: Secret Identity
channel.description: Secret Identity is a weekly podcast focused on the world of comic books, sci-fi, gaming and other areas of geekery. The podcast is done in conjunction with www.secretidentitypodcast.com. Your hosts are Brian LeTendre and Matt "Matman" Herring.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Serving your nerdy needs since 2006!
channel.itunes:author: Brian LeTendre
channel.itunes:summary: Secret Identity is a weekly podcast focused on the world of comic books, sci-fi, gaming and other areas of geekery. The podcast is done in conjunction with www.secretidentitypodcast.com. Your hosts are Brian LeTendre and Matt "Matman" Herring.

item.title: Secret Identity Issue #433--Rapid Thunder, Godzilla and X-Men
item.description: Newsdesk GI Joe Delayed DC’s major announcement Reviews Rapid Thunder Godzilla #1 Boob Tube Bonanza Bob’s Burgers Simpsons House Modern Family Next Avengers Saturday Morning Special X-Men: Night of the Sentinels--Part 1 Creator Spotlight: David Hine--Part 2 Matt continues his discussion with the acclaimed writer, delving into more recent projects, including The Bulletproof Coffin and The Darkness. Send comments to sipodcast@comcast.net OR secretidentityradio@gmail.com. Leave us a voicemail at 860-698-0468. Check out www.secretidentitypodcast.com for all things Secret Identity.

item.title: Secret Identity Issue #431--Earth 2 and Swass-Cast
item.description: Newsdesk SI guests on the Swass-Cast again Mr. T comics Hero Initiative comic Reviews Daredevil #10.1 Earth 2 #1 Boob Tube Bonanza Avengers: EMH Simpsons Ultimate Spider-Man Parks and Rec Bob’s Burgers Cleveland Show Gametime Tree World (iOS) Dark Souls 2nd Playthrough (PS3) Creator Spotlight: David Hine--Part 1 In this first part of a two-part series, Matt speaks with the veteran writer about his work on the Spawn and X-Men franchises. This interview was recorded during New York Comic Con 2011. Send comments to sipodcast@comcast.net OR secretidentityradio@gmail.com. Leave us a voicemail at 860-698-0468. Check out www.secretidentitypodcast.com for all things Secret Identity.

item.title: Secret Identity Issue #429--The Avengers and John Wetton
item.description: Newsdesk Avengers opening weekend Albany Comic Con Reviews FCBD: Witchblade--Unbalanced Pieces FCBD: DC New 52: The Next Wave Boob Tube Bonanza Avengers; EMH Ultimate Spider-Man New Girl Bob’s Burgers Modern Family Saturday Matinee Avengers Creator Spotlight: John Wetton Matt spoke to the legendary singer and musician about the UK reunion tour during their stop in Foxboro, MA. Find out more about the tour at http://www.ukreunion.com. Send comments to sipodcast@comcast.net OR secretidentityradio@gmail.com. Leave us a voicemail at 860-698-0468. Check out www.secretidentitypodcast.com for all things Secret Identity.

item.title: Secret Identity Issue #427--The Almighties, The Walking Dead and Joe Caramagna
item.description: Newsdesk Letter writing campaign for Witch Hunter Previews Guide--upcoming releases Reviews The Almighties #1 Popeye #1 Boob Tube Bonanza Bob’s Burgers New Girl Girl with the Dragon Tattoo Gametime Walking Dead: A New Day Star Wars Kinect (XBox 360) Creator Spotlight: Joe Caramagna Brian spoke with our good friend and letterer extraordinaire about the new series of young reader novels he’s writing. You can order the Amazing Spider-Man: Behind the Mask at Amazon right now (http://tinyurl.com/d6qq6pw). Send comments to sipodcast@comcast.net OR secretidentityradio@gmail.com. Leave us a voicemail at 860-698-0468. Check out www.secretidentitypodcast.com for all things Secret Identity.

item.title: Secret Identity Issue #425--Captain Action and Boston Comic Con
item.description: Newsdesk Boston Comic Con Wrap-up Reviews Marvel Universe Ultimate Spider-Man #1 Batman and Robin #8 Boob Tube Bonanza NHL Playoffs New Girl Breaking Bad Modern Family Ricky Gervais Plastic Fantastic Captain Action--Captain America (www.captainactionnow.com) Creator Spotlight: Aaron Wood At Boston comic con 2012, Brian sat down with the longtime friend of the show to talk about his line of social media propaganda posters. You can get your hands on some over at Aaron’s Etsy store (http://www.etsy.com/people/Justonescarf?ref=pr_profile) Send comments to sipodcast@comcast.net OR secretidentityradio@gmail.com. Leave us a voicemail at 860-698-0468. Check out www.secretidentitypodcast.com for all things Secret Identity.

item.title: Secret Identity Issue #412--AvX, Spider-Man unlimited and The Original Johnson
item.description: Newsdesk Stan Lee Conventions Boston Comic Con Springfield revealed Reviews AvX #0 AvX: Infinite #1 Boob Tube Bonanza Spider-Man Unlimited Life is Short New Girl The Middle DC Nation Raising Hope Trade-Off The Original Johnson Creator Spotlight: Aaron Teplitski Brian spoke with the indie game developer about his Snake 360/361 games and developing for XBox Live indie Games. For more info on Aaron’s games, head over to www.yyrgames.com.
